ComicInfo.Summary:
While Jughead confronts Reggie and his pack, the Coopers are done fooling around and send in the big guns for Jug. Will he-and his sister Jellybean-survive the chaos? Plus, a member of the Riverdale gang makes a startling decision that will change EVERYTHING!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Adam Gorham | 1 | B | Cover B | Tyler Boss | 2 | C | Cover C | Michael Walsh | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:36:51. [CVDB677367]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Gorham, Michael Walsh, Tyler Boss
ComicInfo.Characters: Jellybean Jones, Jughead Jones, Reggie Mantle
